tables.name: UserTable

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserTable ADD COLUMN userId FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: user
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserTable ADD COLUMN user BYTES(MAX)

columns.name: createdTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserTable ADD COLUMN createdTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL OPTIONS (allow_commit_timestamp = true)

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE UserTable (userId FLOAT64 NOT NULL, user BYTES(MAX), createdTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL OPTIONS (allow_commit_timestamp = true)) PRIMARY KEY (userId ASC)

indexes.name: ByTimestamp
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByTimestamp ON UserTable(userId, createdTimestamp)

tables.name: UserContent

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserContent ADD COLUMN userId FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: contentId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserContent ADD COLUMN contentId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: content
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserContent ADD COLUMN content BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE UserContent (userId FLOAT64 NOT NULL, contentId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, content BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (userId ASC, contentId ASC), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT UserTable
